name: Greenmario In Bobbing My Burger
storyline: IN THE DISTANT YEAR OF 4 HUNDRED BILLION THE EVIL AWARD WINNING TERRORIST "REDLUIGI" HAS TAKEN OVER THE UNIVERSE. YOU ARE GREENMARIO, THE WORLD'S GREATEST SUPER SOLDIER. YOU MUST RECLAIM ALL 7 RAMBUNCTIOUS QUARTZ AND WIPE OUT 1.2 BILLION TERRORIST TO FLY YOUR WAY INTO REDLUIGI'S SPACE TOWER. ARE YOU UP FOR THE TRETOROUS CHALLENGE?
summary: A surrealist platformer based on Super Mario and the Amiga demoscene.
